title: Ubuy partners with Nuvei to expand payment options worldwide
description: The integration with Nuvei will allow Ubuy to enter new markets seamlessly. Nuvei currently provides access to 634 APMs through a single integration, allowing online businesses to tailor their payment methods based on regional preferences, the company said in a statement.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
